original_text: Then king David answered and said, Call me Bathsheba. And she came into the king's presence, and stood before the king.
korean_text: 다윗 왕이 명령하여 이르되 밧세바를 내 앞으로 부르라 하매 그가 왕의 앞으로 들어가 그 앞에 서는지라

sentences.original_text: Then king David answered and said
And she came into the king's presence
